Package com.example.courseanalyzer.util

Class CourseLineUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.courseanalyzer.util.CourseLineUtil
  • public final class CourseLineUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Extracts the course information from the line depending of the format of the line thus getCourseFromLine(String) should be called on lines without any weekly hours stated in and getCourseFromLineWithWeeklyHours(String) that contains the weekly hours informations in the line.

    To ensure that no error occures, isLineValidCourseWithoutWeeklyHoursInformation(String) should be called on lines that should not contain weekly hours and isLineValidCourseWithWeeklyHoursInformation(String) should be called on lines that contain the weekly hours.

      Constructor Description
      CourseLineUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • isLineValidCourseWithoutWeeklyHoursInformation

        public static boolean isLineValidCourseWithoutWeeklyHoursInformation​(java.lang.String line)
        Returns true, if the line has the format of a course without the weekly hours information.

        The format of the line is "[\\*|\u2022]?[ ]?[0-9]+[,|.][0-9] [\\w|\u00e4\u00f6\u00fc\u00c4\u00d6\u00dc\u00df]+[\\w|\u00e4\u00f6\u00fc\u00c4\u00d6\u00dc\u00df| |\\+|\\-]*".

        Parameters:
        line - the examined line.
        Returns:
        true, if the line has the format of a course without the weekly hours information.

      • isLineValidCourseWithWeeklyHoursInformation

        public static boolean isLineValidCourseWithWeeklyHoursInformation​(java.lang.String line)
        Returns true, if the line has the format of a course without the weekly hours information.

        The format of the line is "[\\*|\u2022]?[ ]?[0-9]+[,|.][0-9] [\\w|\u00e4\u00f6\u00fc\u00c4\u00d6\u00dc\u00df]+[\\w|\u00e4\u00f6\u00fc\u00c4\u00d6\u00dc\u00df| |\\+|\\-]*".

        Parameters:
        line - the examined line.
        Returns:
        true, if the line has the format of a course without the weekly hours information.

      • getCourseFromLine

        public static Course getCourseFromLine​(java.lang.String line)
        Returns the course by extracting the informations from the line line.

        It is assumed that isLineValidCourseWithoutWeeklyHoursInformation(String) is called before to ensure that the informations are extracted correctly.

        This method should be called on lines that doesn't contain the weekly hours.

        Parameters:
        line - the examined line which is used to extract the course
        Returns:
        the Course by extracting the informations from the line line.

      • getCourseTypeFromLine

        public static CourseType getCourseTypeFromLine​(java.lang.String line)
        Returns the course type depending on the line line.

        The method returns null, if the line does not contain any valid course type.

        Parameters:
        line - the examined line
        Returns:
        the course type depending on the line line.

      • getCourseFromLineWithWeeklyHours

        public static Course getCourseFromLineWithWeeklyHours​(java.lang.String line)
        Returns the course by extracting the informations from the line line.

        It is assumed that isLineValidCourseWithoutWeeklyHoursInformation(String) is called before to ensure that the informations are extracted correctly.

        This method should be called on lines that does contain the weekly hours.

        Parameters:
        line - the examined line which is used to extract the course
        Returns:
        the Course by extracting the informations from the line line.
